channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: At junction 11a southbound right on the exit - huge pot hole!, 13th March
item.description:
Massive pothole!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): M5, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic light has fallen down, 13th March
item.description:
The traffic lights look like they have been hit and are flat on the floor. It's been like it a least a week or two
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A417, Barnwood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Linwell Close sign broken, 13th March
item.description:
Good afternoon, the sign for Linwell Close has split and shattered and might need a new one Thank you, Tabi

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 29 Medoc Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Major potholes on Seneca Way, 13th March
item.description:
Good afternoon, hope you're well. I've come across very serious potholes along Seneca Way, the street is pitted with them and some and deep and very fragmented. There's stray rocks and cracks everywhere - the whole street is in desperate need of renovation. Thank you so much, Tabi

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 14 Distel Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken Up surface, 13th March
item.description:
Broken up surface by lights and growing

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 24 Andover Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 15/20cms potholes in many places along norwood road, they have been highlighted for months but still nothing repaired, 13th March
item.description:
See above

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 52 Rowanfield Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Style missing step, 13th March
item.description:
The far style that provides access onto the track to Swindon Farm has been removed. The style is no longer accessible.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): White Rose Way, Uckington
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Major depressions in road are getting substantially worse, 13th March
item.description:
The gentle depressions in the road from a few years ago have now become major rollercoasters caused by heavy lorries bouncing through the first depression have now caused the 2 nd area to worsen and cut appears some vehicles are grounding
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): M5, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Major depression / pothole on M5J11A southbound off take to Birdlip. This is causing vehicles to take evasive action., 13th March
item.description:
Major sink hole appearing on southbound J11A at commencement of offtake slip road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): M5, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dozen of large potholes, 12th March
item.description:
The potholes have been identified by a white mark but no further action taken . The holes have increased in size and numbers. The holes to Acorn house were done, poorly at that, but then they always are for some unexplained reason.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Coberley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very deep pothole just after junction after rugby club, 12th March
item.description:
Very deep pothole. Seems to be more than one layer deep. It is on the curb side as you drive out of Bishops Cleeve towards Stoke Orchard. I think it is just after the wide junction after the rugby club. But it is on that stretch.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Stoke Road, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tyres Flytipped on side of Road, 12th March
item.description:
The location is the road from Aggs Hill that goes into the Cotswold Way part and just short of the Burnt Oak Crossroads. The tip is on the right hand side approx 15 yards from the crossroads. Please can the tyres be removed as son as possible.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped freezer, 12th March
item.description:
See photo. Dumped freezer. Thanks for clearing.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): C B Search And Rescue Brada Cottage Lower Mill Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road Surface Condition, 11th March
item.description:
Please can you inspect the road condition of Hayden Lane in Staverton as I have received a complaint from a member of the public. The depth of the potholes is causing punctures to vehicles due to the depth. This was previously reported several months ago.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Hayden Lane, Staverton
Report on FixMyStreet
